questions.text: The half-life of one isotope of radium is about 1,600 years. In a given sample of this isotope, 15/16th of the radium atoms will decay in a time most nearly equal to?
When a vector of magnitude 6 units is added to a vector of magnitude 8 units, the magnitude of the resultant vector will be?
The diameter and height of a right circular cylinder are equal. If the volume of the cylinder is 2, what is the height of the cylinder?
What is the distance in space between the points with coordinates left parenthesis negative 3 comma 6 comma 7 right parenthesis and left parenthesis 2 comma negative 1 comma 4 right parenthesis?

Alison deposits $ 500 into a new savings account that earns 5 percent interest compounded annually. If Alison makes no additional deposits or withdrawals, how many years will it take for the amount in the account to double?
